short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the zeroes of any quadratic function. Simple.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chrome extension to help you find the x intercepts of quadratic equations in browser. Helpful for math tests, or just if you love those sweet sweet zeroes!
